docs.text: 首页(废弃) ¶ 重要 ¶ 此博客废弃不再维护, 点击前往新博客 . 博客简介 ¶ 本博客总结了作者大学以来所学的主要 实践 经验,主要供自己查看. 太基础常用的经验会省略. 约定 ¶ 文内出现的shell脚本默认centos7系统下可用. 文章不使用中文标点. 大多数工具考虑中国境内的加速. 除了docker相关工具和vscode,SSH,其它工具大多已经容器化或待容器化,甚至vscode也曾容器化过,而SSH是二者兼有,一般不会对工具的平台部署多做介绍. 更新记录 ¶ 2020 ¶ 2020年华东第一束晨曦奉上,新年快乐呀!!! 更新内容:博客初始化,总结大学实践过的主要内容.

docs.text: 文内出现的shell脚本默认centos7系统下可用. 文章不使用中文标点. 大多数工具考虑中国境内的加速. 除了docker相关工具和vscode,SSH,其它工具大多已经容器化或待容器化,甚至vscode也曾容器化过,而SSH是二者兼有,一般不会对工具的平台部署多做介绍.

docs.text: 2020年华东第一束晨曦奉上,新年快乐呀!!! 更新内容:博客初始化,总结大学实践过的主要内容.

关于 ¶ 内容 ¶ 本博客总结了作者大学以来所学的主要 实践 经验,主要供自己查看,会持续更新. --2020 技术 ¶ 这是基于 mkdocs-material 容器编写的一篇博客,首先得感谢镜像作者Martin为我们提供了如此美妙的工具. 作者 ( @林宇靖 ) ¶ 转眼已到大三,大学课程所剩无几,是时候开始找实习工作了.几年来自己也不是没有注意总结,相反我是那种特别愿意花功夫在战略总结上的人,每次做完一件事总花很多时间在思考下次怎么把事情做得更快,所以也写了不少不成系统的框架和脚本.故此在这里系统总结实践所得,以便今后查找调用. --2020
docs.title: 关于

docs.text: Mongodb ¶ 部署 ¶ mongo: image: mongo:latest # restart: always ports: - 27017:27017 volumes: - ./data/db:/data/db - ./data/configdb:/data/configdb environment: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME: 333 MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD: "333" mongo-express: image: mongo-express:0.49 # restart: always ports: - 8082:8081 environment: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME: 333 ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD: "333" ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_USERNAME: mongodb ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_PASSWORD: 333 depends_on: - mongo 技巧 ¶ 时间序列 ¶ 当前最火的github项目当属,TDengine时序空间大数据引擎啦.对于时间序列型数据,实验室一直用的是(时间,地点,数据值)存储.对于海洋数据来说,这似乎相当不合理,毕竟无论B树索引还是hash索引都面临这索引过大的问题.而且对于bson数据来说,这种结构造成了太多冗余,占用外存也十分巨大.据说插数据查数据都挺费劲的.比起在一个raid阵列上运行mongodb集群,这还错误不算太low. 实验中,直接将数据存成数组,某点无数据则用null充填,使用slice切片索引数据,这样天然隐含hash索引思想,既不需要建立索引,又能实现O(1)复杂度的搜索效率.实验结果,在单mongodb容器中(2G,单核3.2Hz)100年的每小时潮位数据,算上用python生成随机数据,单地点插入耗时也是秒级的,索引耗时小于5毫秒,并随索引次数的增加而减小(可能是mongodb将其缓存到内存中了,数据不到4MB,这是数据密集的优势).这里存的是32位整数,但潮位数据只要16位够了,故可以考虑更密集的存法. 有时间一定出个TDengine经验总结. 经验 ¶ mongolass使用 ¶ 使用mongolass时需保证用户在数据库上,并且集合名是以s结尾的(不确定se是否可行,觉得这挺坑的,不过不建表的话会自动生成,包括索引也可以在nodejs代码里控制).这以为着我们需要先插入一条数据生成数据库,然后手动新建用户.
docs.title: Mongodb

docs.text: mongo: image: mongo:latest # restart: always ports: - 27017:27017 volumes: - ./data/db:/data/db - ./data/configdb:/data/configdb environment: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME: 333 MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD: "333" mongo-express: image: mongo-express:0.49 # restart: always ports: - 8082:8081 environment: ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINUSERNAME: 333 ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ADMINPASSWORD: "333" ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_USERNAME: mongodb ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_PASSWORD: 333 depends_on: - mongo
docs.title: 部署

docs.text: 当前最火的github项目当属,TDengine时序空间大数据引擎啦.对于时间序列型数据,实验室一直用的是(时间,地点,数据值)存储.对于海洋数据来说,这似乎相当不合理,毕竟无论B树索引还是hash索引都面临这索引过大的问题.而且对于bson数据来说,这种结构造成了太多冗余,占用外存也十分巨大.据说插数据查数据都挺费劲的.比起在一个raid阵列上运行mongodb集群,这还错误不算太low. 实验中,直接将数据存成数组,某点无数据则用null充填,使用slice切片索引数据,这样天然隐含hash索引思想,既不需要建立索引,又能实现O(1)复杂度的搜索效率.实验结果,在单mongodb容器中(2G,单核3.2Hz)100年的每小时潮位数据,算上用python生成随机数据,单地点插入耗时也是秒级的,索引耗时小于5毫秒,并随索引次数的增加而减小(可能是mongodb将其缓存到内存中了,数据不到4MB,这是数据密集的优势).这里存的是32位整数,但潮位数据只要16位够了,故可以考虑更密集的存法. 有时间一定出个TDengine经验总结.
docs.title: 时间序列

docs.text: 使用mongolass时需保证用户在数据库上,并且集合名是以s结尾的(不确定se是否可行,觉得这挺坑的,不过不建表的话会自动生成,包括索引也可以在nodejs代码里控制).这以为着我们需要先插入一条数据生成数据库,然后手动新建用户.

docs.text: 镜像源修改 ¶ 由于经常在纯净系统内操作,故一般用sed命令执行. ubuntu: sed -i s@/archive.ubuntu.com/@/mirrors.aliyun.com/@g /etc/apt/sources.list debain: sed -i s@/deb.debian.org/@/mirrors.aliyun.com/@g /etc/apt/sources.list python: echo 'index-url = https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple' >> ~/.pip/pip.conf docker: 见 docker加速器配置
docs.title: 镜像源修改

docs.text: 由于经常在纯净系统内操作,故一般用sed命令执行. ubuntu: sed -i s@/archive.ubuntu.com/@/mirrors.aliyun.com/@g /etc/apt/sources.list debain: sed -i s@/deb.debian.org/@/mirrors.aliyun.com/@g /etc/apt/sources.list python: echo 'index-url = https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple' >> ~/.pip/pip.conf docker: 见 docker加速器配置
docs.title: 镜像源修改

docs.text: 网络管理技巧 ¶ 端口复用 ¶ 当你只有两个端口时,SSH端口转发可以帮你实现全内网SSH控制: # 本地端口转发 ssh - L < local port >:< remote host >:< remote port > < SSH hostname > # 实际使用 firewall - cmd -- query - masquerade # 检查是否允许伪装IP firewall - cmd -- add - masquerade # 允许防火墙伪装IP firewall - cmd -- remove - masquerade # 禁止防火墙伪装IP # 开启端口转发 firewall - cmd -- permanent -- add - forward - port = port = 5901 : proto = tcp : toport = 22 : toaddr = 192.168.169.168 # 关闭端口转发 firewall - cmd -- permanent -- remove - forward - port = port = 5901 : proto = tcp : toport = 22 : toaddr = 192.168.169.168 # 转发配置 ssh - N - v - R 192.168.169.17 : 5901 : 192.168.169.168 : 22 ylin @ 192.168.169.17 # 端口转发还可以做流量分发 单端口全内网http/https访问: 详见 nginx
docs.title: 网络管理技巧

docs.text: 当你只有两个端口时,SSH端口转发可以帮你实现全内网SSH控制: # 本地端口转发 ssh - L < local port >:< remote host >:< remote port > < SSH hostname > # 实际使用 firewall - cmd -- query - masquerade # 检查是否允许伪装IP firewall - cmd -- add - masquerade # 允许防火墙伪装IP firewall - cmd -- remove - masquerade # 禁止防火墙伪装IP # 开启端口转发 firewall - cmd -- permanent -- add - forward - port = port = 5901 : proto = tcp : toport = 22 : toaddr = 192.168.169.168 # 关闭端口转发 firewall - cmd -- permanent -- remove - forward - port = port = 5901 : proto = tcp : toport = 22 : toaddr = 192.168.169.168 # 转发配置 ssh - N - v - R 192.168.169.17 : 5901 : 192.168.169.168 : 22 ylin @ 192.168.169.17 # 端口转发还可以做流量分发 单端口全内网http/https访问: 详见 nginx
docs.title: 端口复用

docs.text: X11转发 ¶ 步骤 ¶ 服务器配置 yum install xterm xauth # 然后修改/etc/ssh/sshd_conf中的X11Forwarding为yes sed - i '/X11Forwarding/cX11Forwarding yes' / etc / ssh / sshd_conf 参考 ¶ https://blog.csdn.net/smstong/article/details/46328247
docs.title: X11转发

docs.text: 服务器配置 yum install xterm xauth # 然后修改/etc/ssh/sshd_conf中的X11Forwarding为yes sed - i '/X11Forwarding/cX11Forwarding yes' / etc / ssh / sshd_conf

docs.text: 开发与发布 ¶ python生产环境 ¶ FROM python:3 WORKDIR /usr/src/app COPY requirements.txt ./ RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt COPY . . CMD [ "python" , "./your-daemon-or-script.py" ] python开发环境 ¶ SSH容器 ¶ 年轻时将SSH+python容器结合pycharm开发,用得也蛮开心的. FROM python:3.8 VOLUME [ "/venvs" ] RUN mkdir ~/.pip && \ echo '[global]' >> ~/.pip/pip.conf && \ echo 'index-url = https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple' >> ~/.pip/pip.conf && \ pip install virtualenv && \ # 注释掉的为SSH安装代码,开发没必要 # sed -i s@/deb.debian.org/@/mirrors.aliyun.com/@g /etc/apt/sources.list &&\ # apt-get update &&\ # apt-get install -y openssh-server sudo &&\ # echo 'root:passwd' | chpasswd &&\ # mkdir /var/run/sshd &&\ # sed -i 's/#PermitRootLogin prohibit-password/PermitRootLogin yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config &&\ # sed 's@session\s*required\s*pam_loginuid.so@session optional pam_loginuid.so@g' -i /etc/pam.d/sshd &&\ # echo "export VISIBLE=now" >> /etc/profile # CMD ["sh","-c","service ssh start && tail -f /var/log/btmp"] # 需要有个非后台进程充当守护进程,保持容器运行 CMD [ "tail -f /var/log/btmp" ] python: image: ylin/py_docker:v0.0.0 build: . ports: - 8000:8000 volumes: - ./venvs:/venvs - ./projects:/projects command: ["tail","-f","/var/log/btmp"] Jupyter ¶ docker run -p 8888:8888 jupyter/base-notebook virtualenv ¶ # 构建 cd df && docker build . - t ylin_python : base -3.8 # 创建虚拟环境 virtualenv env_name # 激活虚拟环境 source ./bin / activate # 查看当前库 pip list # 退出虚拟环境 deactivate # 删除虚拟环境 rmvirtualenv test # 冻结环境依赖 pip freeze > requirements.txt # 安装环境依赖 pip install - r requirements.txt python容器进化(实验) ¶ python: image: python:3 ports: - 4000:8000 volumes: # - ./src/python3.7/base:/usr/local/lib/python3.7 - ./src/python3.7/base:/usr/local/lib/python3.7 - ./src/projects/flask:/project working_dir: /project command: ["tail","-f","/var/log/btmp"] vscode使用 Remote-Containers 选择"从 docker-compose.yml 中打开目录"便可 pypy ¶ 一样的道理: FROM pypy:3 WORKDIR /usr/src/app COPY requirements.txt ./ RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt COPY . . CMD [ "pypy3" , "./your-daemon-or-script.py" ] docker run -it --rm --name my-running-script -v "$PWD":/usr/src/myapp -w /usr/src/myapp pypy:3 pypy3 your-daemon-or-script.p
docs.title: 开发与发布

docs.text: FROM python:3 WORKDIR /usr/src/app COPY requirements.txt ./ RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt COPY . . CMD [ "python" , "./your-daemon-or-script.py" ]
docs.title: python生产环境

docs.text: 年轻时将SSH+python容器结合pycharm开发,用得也蛮开心的. FROM python:3.8 VOLUME [ "/venvs" ] RUN mkdir ~/.pip && \ echo '[global]' >> ~/.pip/pip.conf && \ echo 'index-url = https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple' >> ~/.pip/pip.conf && \ pip install virtualenv && \ # 注释掉的为SSH安装代码,开发没必要 # sed -i s@/deb.debian.org/@/mirrors.aliyun.com/@g /etc/apt/sources.list &&\ # apt-get update &&\ # apt-get install -y openssh-server sudo &&\ # echo 'root:passwd' | chpasswd &&\ # mkdir /var/run/sshd &&\ # sed -i 's/#PermitRootLogin prohibit-password/PermitRootLogin yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config &&\ # sed 's@session\s*required\s*pam_loginuid.so@session optional pam_loginuid.so@g' -i /etc/pam.d/sshd &&\ # echo "export VISIBLE=now" >> /etc/profile # CMD ["sh","-c","service ssh start && tail -f /var/log/btmp"] # 需要有个非后台进程充当守护进程,保持容器运行 CMD [ "tail -f /var/log/btmp" ] python: image: ylin/py_docker:v0.0.0 build: . ports: - 8000:8000 volumes: - ./venvs:/venvs - ./projects:/projects command: ["tail","-f","/var/log/btmp"]
docs.title: SSH容器

CMD [ "pypy3" , "./your-daemon-or-script.py" ] docker run -it --rm --name my-running-script -v "$PWD":/usr/src/myapp -w /usr/src/myapp pypy:3 pypy3 your-daemon-or-script.p

docs.text: Django ¶ 快速开始 ¶ # 新建项目 django - admin startproject api # 迁移 python manage.py migrate # 启动 python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0 : 8000 # 生产环境部署 uwsgi -- socket 0.0.0.0 : 8000 -- protocol = http - w api / wsgi : application 参考 ¶ 官网

docs.text: dir () # 返回模块或类所包含的全部成员 obj . __all__ # 查看模块内的成员 pip freeze > requirements . txt # 生成依赖配置文件
docs.title: 其它

docs.text: dawn ¶ dawn是结合docker与eclipse/starUML的产物,可作为java开发IDE或staruml绘图工具,支持Tomacat等.当时最新的linux-eclipse版本是2019.6,故IDE一直是这版本,因为找到了更好的替代工具,已经放弃eclipse和starUML了.介于这名字起得挺秒的,故在此分享下构建思路. dockerfile FROM ubuntu:latest RUN sed -i s@/archive.ubuntu.com/@/mirrors.aliyun.com/@g /etc/apt/sources.list && apt-get clean RUN apt-get update && \ apt-get install -y \ libgtk-3-0 libcanberra-gtk-module \ fonts-droid-fallback ttf-wqy-zenhei ttf-wqy-microhei fonts-arphic-ukai fonts-arphic-uming locales \ libnss3-dev libx11-xcb-dev libxss-dev net-tools libdbus-glib-1-2 && \ locale-gen zh_CN && locale-gen zh_CN.utf8 ENV JAVA_HOME = /jdk ENV JRE_HOME = ${ JAVA_HOME } /jre ENV CLASSPATH = .: ${ JAVA_HOME } /lib: ${ JRE_HOME } /lib ENV PATH = ${ JAVA_HOME } /bin/: $PATH ENV LANG C.UTF-8 ENV LANGUAGE C.UTF-8 ENV LC_ALL C.UTF-8 VOLUME /app VOLUME /jdk VOLUME /workspace docker-compose version: '2.1' services: eclipse: image: ylin/dawn:v0.0.2 # build: ./src/df environment: - DISPLAY=10.0.75.1:1.0 volumes: # - ./src/eclipse201910:/app # - ./src/vscode201910:/app - ./src/startuml201910:/app - ./src/workspace:/workspaces - ./src/jdk1.8.0_221:/jdk command: # ["/app/eclipse"] # ["/app/bin/code","--user-data-dir=/app/user_data_dir"] ["/app/AppRun"] # ["tail","-f","/var/log/btmp"] 发现以前还拿他但vscode用,哈哈,我的想象力真丰富. tomcat version: '2.1' services: eclipse: image: ylin/dawn:base environment: - DISPLAY=10.0.75.1:0.0 ports: - 8080:8080 volumes: - ./eclipse/workspace:/workspace - ./eclipse/jdk1.8.0_221:/jdk - ./eclipse/eclipse:/app/eclipse - ./eclipse/apache-tomcat-9.0.27:/app/tomcat - ./eclipse/share:/share command: ["/app/eclipse/eclipse"] mysql: image: mysql:5.7.28 environment: - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 ports: - 3306:3306 volumes: - ./mysql/conf.d:/etc/mysql/conf.d - ./mysql/data:/va/lib/mysql 讲道理,这镜像换jdk也很方便,可惜时代变了,哈哈.
docs.title: dawn

docs.text: Mock ¶ 曾用docker写过两个mock服务器的部署(easyMock,DOClever),用起来还可以,后来设计了一个基于flask的API框架,API开发极为简便,使用伪数据时天然就是mock,辅以API文档生成工具可替代前者,故淘汰.
docs.title: Mock

docs.text: 曾用docker写过两个mock服务器的部署(easyMock,DOClever),用起来还可以,后来设计了一个基于flask的API框架,API开发极为简便,使用伪数据时天然就是mock,辅以API文档生成工具可替代前者,故淘汰.
docs.title: Mock

docs.text: 虚拟机 ¶ 当年自己虚拟机玩得很嗨,和伙伴在实验室部署了两台esxi服务器,用vsphere管理,用的还是企业级固态硬盘做raid6,花了不少经费.自己在本地也做了很多hyper-v,vmware,v-box基础镜像,包括虚拟内存盘,各种必要软件和配置...可现在看来,这些都没有留下的必要.分明仅过去一年而已,当时似乎也很开心,怎么就往事如烟了呢?
docs.title: 虚拟机

docs.text: 当年自己虚拟机玩得很嗨,和伙伴在实验室部署了两台esxi服务器,用vsphere管理,用的还是企业级固态硬盘做raid6,花了不少经费.自己在本地也做了很多hyper-v,vmware,v-box基础镜像,包括虚拟内存盘,各种必要软件和配置...可现在看来,这些都没有留下的必要.分明仅过去一年而已,当时似乎也很开心,怎么就往事如烟了呢?
docs.title: 虚拟机

docs.text: 总览 ¶ 开发经历 ¶ 未特别说明则为独立开发.x实验室研究方向为物理海洋. 大一 ¶ c,c++,链表实现增删查改的图书管理系统(作业,黑箱子); java,安卓端记事本应用(比赛,https://github.com/lprintf/notebook); 大二 ¶ python,水文数据清洗工具及部分中间件开发(x实验室工作内容,重构修改位为主); python,Tk,文档数据清洗工具(科大讯飞实习工作内容); python,C#,pytorch,unity,基于AI识别与AR展示的移动海洋馆(移动端,比赛,衍生项目有垃圾分类); python,pytorch,超分辨率重构(ASC19大题); 其它零碎的数据爬取,清洗工作(x实验室); 大三 ¶ tomcat,网上商城(作业,仅修改实现部分功能); java,进销存(作业,仅修改实现部分功能); pytorch,水下图像重建(作业,效果不明显,如果时间充裕应使用GAN代替CNN); js,vue,内波项目(x实验室工作内容,重构修改前端并添加功能,主要负责后端); js,vue,潮汐项目(x实验室工作内容,架构与开发,离开x实验室前由他人接手开发); node,vue,nginx,mongodb,e-work在线签名平台(比赛);
docs.title: 总览

docs.text: 未特别说明则为独立开发.x实验室研究方向为物理海洋.

docs.text: Docker ¶ Docker安装 ¶ yum remove docker \ docker - client \ docker - client - latest \ docker - common \ docker - latest \ docker - latest - logrotate \ docker - logrotate \ docker - engine && yum install - y yum - utils device - mapper - persistent - data lvm2 && yum - config - manager -- add - repo http :// mirrors.aliyun.com / docker - ce / linux / centos / docker - ce.repo && yum makecache fast && yum - y install docker - ce && systemctl start docker && yum - y install epel - release && yum - y install python - pip && pip install -- upgrade pip && pip install docker - compose -- ignore - installed requests # pip install docker-compose 部署Docker Registry ¶ version: '2.1' services: registry: image: registry container_name: nginx restart: always volumes: - ./src/registry:/var/lib/registry ports: - 5000:5000 ui: image: konradkleine/docker-registry-frontend:v2 ports: - 8080:80 environment: - ENV_DOCKER_REGISTRY_HOST=registry - ENV_DOCKER_REGISTRY_PORT=5000 depends_on: - registry 使用 ¶ # 非本地服务器需配置/etc/docker/daemon.json如下,否则默认https协议 { "insecure-registries" : [ "registry的IP地址:端口号" ] } # 优先下载私有仓库镜像 { "allow-nondistributable-artifacts" : [ "registry的IP地址:端口号" ] } $ docker pull ubuntu $ docker tag ubuntu localhost : 5000 / ubuntu $ docker push localhost : 5000 / ubuntu 加速器 ¶ # 修改/etc/docker/daemon.json { "registry-mirrors": [ "https://registry.docker-cn.com" ] } # 重启docker $ sudo systemctl daemon-reload $ sudo systemctl restart docker 参考 ¶ docker CSDN 企业级镜像仓库 ¶ harbor
docs.title: Docker

docs.text: yum remove docker \ docker - client \ docker - client - latest \ docker - common \ docker - latest \ docker - latest - logrotate \ docker - logrotate \ docker - engine && yum install - y yum - utils device - mapper - persistent - data lvm2 && yum - config - manager -- add - repo http :// mirrors.aliyun.com / docker - ce / linux / centos / docker - ce.repo && yum makecache fast && yum - y install docker - ce && systemctl start docker && yum - y install epel - release && yum - y install python - pip && pip install -- upgrade pip && pip install docker - compose -- ignore - installed requests # pip install docker-compose
docs.title: Docker安装

docs.text: version: '2.1' services: registry: image: registry container_name: nginx restart: always volumes: - ./src/registry:/var/lib/registry ports: - 5000:5000 ui: image: konradkleine/docker-registry-frontend:v2 ports: - 8080:80 environment: - ENV_DOCKER_REGISTRY_HOST=registry - ENV_DOCKER_REGISTRY_PORT=5000 depends_on: - registry
docs.title: 部署Docker Registry

docs.text: # 非本地服务器需配置/etc/docker/daemon.json如下,否则默认https协议 { "insecure-registries" : [ "registry的IP地址:端口号" ] } # 优先下载私有仓库镜像 { "allow-nondistributable-artifacts" : [ "registry的IP地址:端口号" ] } $ docker pull ubuntu $ docker tag ubuntu localhost : 5000 / ubuntu $ docker push localhost : 5000 / ubuntu
docs.title: 使用

docs.text: # 修改/etc/docker/daemon.json { "registry-mirrors": [ "https://registry.docker-cn.com" ] } # 重启docker $ sudo systemctl daemon-reload $ sudo systemctl restart docker

docs.text: Git ¶ Git安装 ¶ yum remove git && yum install - y curl - devel expat - devel gettext - devel openssl - devel zlib - devel && yum install - y gcc perl - ExtUtils - MakeMaker && cd / usr / src && # wget https://forensics.cert.org/cert-forensics-tools-release-el7.rpm && # yum install cert-forensics-tools-release-el7.rpm && wget https :// www.kernel.org / pub / software / scm / git / git -2.7.3 .tar.gz && tar xzf git -2.7.3 .tar.gz && cd git -2.7.3 && make prefix =/ usr / local / git all && make prefix =/ usr / local / git install && # ./configure --without-iconv && # make CFLAGS=-liconv prefix=/usr/local/git all && # make CFLAGS=-liconv prefix=/usr/local/git install && cd / usr / bin && ln - s / usr / local / git / bin / git git && git -- version 常用命令 ¶ 通用 # 用户配置 git config --global user.name "林宇靖" git config --global user.email "lprintf@qq.com" # 项目初始化 cd existing_folder git init git remote add origin http://git.fvcom.org/ylin/my_profile.git git add . git commit git push -u origin master # 需改远程仓库地址 git remote set-url origin URL # 查看远程仓库地址 git remote -v # 其它 git remote rm origin git remote add origin 技巧 # 删除提交记录 git checkout -- orphan latest_branch git add - A git commit - am "commit message" git branch - D master git branch - m master git push - f origin master gitlab部署 ¶ gitlab: image: 'gitlab/gitlab-ce:latest' restart: always hostname: 'gitlab.ylin.com' environment: GITLAB_OMNIBUS_CONFIG: | external_url 'http://gitlab.ylin.com:7080' gitlab_rails['gitlab_shell_ssh_port'] = 7022 # Add any other gitlab.rb configuration here, each on its own line ports: - '7080:7080' # - '7443:443' - '7022:22' volumes: - ./src/config:/etc/gitlab - ./src/logs:/var/log/gitlab - ./src/data:/var/opt/gitlab 注意: 部署耗时较长,请耐心等待 部署后需要做域名解析 由于端口不足才禁用https,端口充足请重配置. 参考https://docs.gitlab.com/omnibus/docker/#install-gitlab-using-docker-compose 开启gitlab pages ¶ 修改gitlab.rb如下 ##! Define to enable GitLab Pages pages_external_url "http://ylin.com/" gitlab_pages [ 'enable' ] = true 操作没这么简单,不建议开启,详见https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/administration/pages/index.html github静态网站部署 ¶ # 把构建生成的静态文件推至某项目,并在仓库setting设置github pages便可. # 参考 https://www.cnblogs.com/MuYunyun/p/6082359.html https://help.github.com/en/github/working-with-github-pages/creating-a-github-pages-site gitlab静态网站部署 ¶ 新建 .gitlab-ci.yml 文件,选择html模板创建. 到项目的setting>pages页面配置 参考 ¶ gitlab github
docs.title: Git

docs.text: yum remove git && yum install - y curl - devel expat - devel gettext - devel openssl - devel zlib - devel && yum install - y gcc perl - ExtUtils - MakeMaker && cd / usr / src && # wget https://forensics.cert.org/cert-forensics-tools-release-el7.rpm && # yum install cert-forensics-tools-release-el7.rpm && wget https :// www.kernel.org / pub / software / scm / git / git -2.7.3 .tar.gz && tar xzf git -2.7.3 .tar.gz && cd git -2.7.3 && make prefix =/ usr / local / git all && make prefix =/ usr / local / git install && # ./configure --without-iconv && # make CFLAGS=-liconv prefix=/usr/local/git all && # make CFLAGS=-liconv prefix=/usr/local/git install && cd / usr / bin && ln - s / usr / local / git / bin / git git && git -- version
docs.title: Git安装

docs.text: 通用 # 用户配置 git config --global user.name "林宇靖" git config --global user.email "lprintf@qq.com" # 项目初始化 cd existing_folder git init git remote add origin http://git.fvcom.org/ylin/my_profile.git git add . git commit git push -u origin master # 需改远程仓库地址 git remote set-url origin URL # 查看远程仓库地址 git remote -v # 其它 git remote rm origin git remote add origin 技巧 # 删除提交记录 git checkout -- orphan latest_branch git add - A git commit - am "commit message" git branch - D master git branch - m master git push - f origin master
docs.title: 常用命令

docs.text: gitlab: image: 'gitlab/gitlab-ce:latest' restart: always hostname: 'gitlab.ylin.com' environment: GITLAB_OMNIBUS_CONFIG: | external_url 'http://gitlab.ylin.com:7080' gitlab_rails['gitlab_shell_ssh_port'] = 7022 # Add any other gitlab.rb configuration here, each on its own line ports: - '7080:7080' # - '7443:443' - '7022:22' volumes: - ./src/config:/etc/gitlab - ./src/logs:/var/log/gitlab - ./src/data:/var/opt/gitlab 注意: 部署耗时较长,请耐心等待 部署后需要做域名解析 由于端口不足才禁用https,端口充足请重配置. 参考https://docs.gitlab.com/omnibus/docker/#install-gitlab-using-docker-compose
docs.title: gitlab部署

docs.text: 修改gitlab.rb如下 ##! Define to enable GitLab Pages pages_external_url "http://ylin.com/" gitlab_pages [ 'enable' ] = true 操作没这么简单,不建议开启,详见https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/administration/pages/index.html
docs.title: 开启gitlab pages

docs.title: github静态网站部署

docs.text: Jenkins ¶ 说明 ¶ 可能是今后的主要学习方向之一.<我的第一本docker书>中提到了一种套娃式的Jenkins部署方案,但总感觉这种方案复杂度太高.待进一步研究学习. gitlab,github似乎也出了CI/CD工具,python语言实现的Buildbot似乎也蛮受欢迎的,故本篇待定. 部署 ¶ version: '2.1' services: cultivating: image: jenkins ports: - 8001:8080 volumes: - ./data/jenkins_home:/var/jenkins_home
docs.title: Jenkins

docs.text: 可能是今后的主要学习方向之一.<我的第一本docker书>中提到了一种套娃式的Jenkins部署方案,但总感觉这种方案复杂度太高.待进一步研究学习. gitlab,github似乎也出了CI/CD工具,python语言实现的Buildbot似乎也蛮受欢迎的,故本篇待定.

docs.text: MkDocs ¶ docker配置 ¶ docs: image: squidfunk/mkdocs-material ports: - 8888:8000 volumes: - ./src:/docs 常用命令 ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. 常用配置 ¶ # Project information site_name: 'ylin的经验总结' site_description: '总结所学常用开发技巧' site_author: '林宇靖' site_url: 'https://github.com/lprintf' # Repository repo_name: 'ylin的经验总结' repo_url: 'https://github.com/lprintf' # Copyright copyright: 'Article Copyright © 2019-2020 ylin' # Configuration theme: name: 'material' language: 'en' palette: primary: 'indigo' accent: 'indigo' font: text: 'Roboto' code: 'Roboto Mono' # Customization extra: manifest: 'manifest.webmanifest' social: - type: 'github' link: 'https://github.com/lprintf' - type: 'twitter' link: 'https://github.com/lprintf' - type: 'linkedin' link: 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/%E5%AE%87%E9%9D%96-%E6%9E%97-49b442171' # # Google Analytics # google_analytics: # - 'UA-XXXXXXXX-X' # - 'auto' # Extensions markdown_extensions: - admonition - codehilite: guess_lang: false - toc: permalink: true 参考 ¶ Material for MkDocs
docs.title: MkDocs

docs.text: docs: image: squidfunk/mkdocs-material ports: - 8888:8000 volumes: - ./src:/docs
docs.title: docker配置

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
docs.title: 常用命令

docs.text: # Project information site_name: 'ylin的经验总结' site_description: '总结所学常用开发技巧' site_author: '林宇靖' site_url: 'https://github.com/lprintf' # Repository repo_name: 'ylin的经验总结' repo_url: 'https://github.com/lprintf' # Copyright copyright: 'Article Copyright © 2019-2020 ylin' # Configuration theme: name: 'material' language: 'en' palette: primary: 'indigo' accent: 'indigo' font: text: 'Roboto' code: 'Roboto Mono' # Customization extra: manifest: 'manifest.webmanifest' social: - type: 'github' link: 'https://github.com/lprintf' - type: 'twitter' link: 'https://github.com/lprintf' - type: 'linkedin' link: 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/%E5%AE%87%E9%9D%96-%E6%9E%97-49b442171' # # Google Analytics # google_analytics: # - 'UA-XXXXXXXX-X' # - 'auto' # Extensions markdown_extensions: - admonition - codehilite: guess_lang: false - toc: permalink: true

docs.title: 参考

docs.text: nginx ¶ 构建 ¶ nginx: restart: always image: nginx:latest ports: - 80:80 - 443:443 volumes: - ./src/conf/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro - ./src/conf_d:/etc/nginx/conf.d:ro - ./src/logs:/var/log/nginx - ./src/share:/usr/share 配置 ¶ nginx.conf user nginx; worker_processes 1; error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log warn; pid /var/run/nginx.pid; events { worker_connections 1024; } http { include /etc/nginx/mime.types; default_type application/octet-stream; client_max_body_size 100M; log_format main '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" ' '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" ' '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"'; access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log main; sendfile on;#减少拷贝和模式切换 tcp_nopush on;#减少网络拥塞,会增加延迟 keepalive_timeout 65; gzip on; #只有超过1k的文件才压缩 gzip_min_length 1k; #对文本文件压缩,不对图片压缩(意义不大,甚至有点亏) gzip_types text/plain application/javascript text/css application/font-woff; #低版本IE禁用Gzip压缩 gzip_disable "MSIE [1-6]\." #每个内存页为4k,申请32倍 gzip_buffers 32 4k; #压缩等级,1级压缩率已经很高,考虑到网速越来越快,1级压缩已经足够. gzip_comp_level 1; #静态资源缓存,对压缩后的资源进行缓存,大幅减少cpu占用 proxy_temp_path /nginx-temp; #levels代表采用1:2也就是两级目录的形式保存缓存文件(静态资源css,js)，同时文件名进行了md5编码 #keys_zone 定义缓存的名称及内存的使用，名称为babytun-cache,在内存中开始100m交换空间 #inactive=7d 如果某个缓存文件超过7天没有被访问，则删除,如果7天内访问过，则延续7天 #max_size=20g 代表设置文件夹最大不能超过20g,超过后会自动将访问频率（命中率）最低的缓存文件删除 proxy_cache_path /nginx-cache levels=1:2 keys_zone=babytun-cache:100m inactive=7d max_size=20g; #服务器池配置,为微服务框架集成,灰度部署及负载均衡做准备 #开发环境部署一个就够了 upstream api{ #最多失败1次 连接2秒就要切换其他服务器 server api:80 weight=2 max_fails=1 fail_timeout=5s; } include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf; } default.conf (demo) # 默认拒绝所有 server { listen 80; server_name default; location / { deny all; } } server { listen 80; server_name 192.168.169.16 *.shou.edu.cn; charset utf-8; # location /src/ { # # proxy_pass http://host.docker.internal:80; # proxy_pass http://httpd/src/; # 表示不切换路径 # } location /api/ { proxy_pass http://api/api/; proxy_set_header Host $Host; } location / { root /usr/share/; try_files $uri $uri/ @root; # autoindex on; # autoindex_exact_size off; } location @root { # 匹配失败返回根目录 rewrite /(.*)$ / last; } # location ~ .*\.(wma|wmv|asf|mp3|mp4|mmf|zip|rar|jpg|gif|png|swf|flv)$ { # valid_referers none blocked server_names *.test.com http://IP; # if ($invalid_referer) { # return 403; # } # expires 24h; # access_log off; # } location ~ /\. { deny all; } # error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html; # location = /50x.html { # root /usr/share; # } } 使用心得 ¶ 平时使用nginx主要是为了实现端口复用,实验室开端口不容易,上次受到攻击后端口只剩一个了,故放弃控制,用nginx实现一个端口访问所有资源(按需配置server便可).两个端口则可以实现 全内网控制 .
docs.title: nginx

docs.text: nginx: restart: always image: nginx:latest ports: - 80:80 - 443:443 volumes: - ./src/conf/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro - ./src/conf_d:/etc/nginx/conf.d:ro - ./src/logs:/var/log/nginx - ./src/share:/usr/share
docs.title: 构建

docs.text: nginx.conf user nginx; worker_processes 1; error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log warn; pid /var/run/nginx.pid; events { worker_connections 1024; } http { include /etc/nginx/mime.types; default_type application/octet-stream; client_max_body_size 100M; log_format main '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" ' '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" ' '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"'; access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log main; sendfile on;#减少拷贝和模式切换 tcp_nopush on;#减少网络拥塞,会增加延迟 keepalive_timeout 65; gzip on; #只有超过1k的文件才压缩 gzip_min_length 1k; #对文本文件压缩,不对图片压缩(意义不大,甚至有点亏) gzip_types text/plain application/javascript text/css application/font-woff; #低版本IE禁用Gzip压缩 gzip_disable "MSIE [1-6]\." #每个内存页为4k,申请32倍 gzip_buffers 32 4k; #压缩等级,1级压缩率已经很高,考虑到网速越来越快,1级压缩已经足够. gzip_comp_level 1; #静态资源缓存,对压缩后的资源进行缓存,大幅减少cpu占用 proxy_temp_path /nginx-temp; #levels代表采用1:2也就是两级目录的形式保存缓存文件(静态资源css,js)，同时文件名进行了md5编码 #keys_zone 定义缓存的名称及内存的使用，名称为babytun-cache,在内存中开始100m交换空间 #inactive=7d 如果某个缓存文件超过7天没有被访问，则删除,如果7天内访问过，则延续7天 #max_size=20g 代表设置文件夹最大不能超过20g,超过后会自动将访问频率（命中率）最低的缓存文件删除 proxy_cache_path /nginx-cache levels=1:2 keys_zone=babytun-cache:100m inactive=7d max_size=20g; #服务器池配置,为微服务框架集成,灰度部署及负载均衡做准备 #开发环境部署一个就够了 upstream api{ #最多失败1次 连接2秒就要切换其他服务器 server api:80 weight=2 max_fails=1 fail_timeout=5s; } include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf; } default.conf (demo) # 默认拒绝所有 server { listen 80; server_name default; location / { deny all; } } server { listen 80; server_name 192.168.169.16 *.shou.edu.cn; charset utf-8; # location /src/ { # # proxy_pass http://host.docker.internal:80; # proxy_pass http://httpd/src/; # 表示不切换路径 # } location /api/ { proxy_pass http://api/api/; proxy_set_header Host $Host; } location / { root /usr/share/; try_files $uri $uri/ @root; # autoindex on; # autoindex_exact_size off; } location @root { # 匹配失败返回根目录 rewrite /(.*)$ / last; } # location ~ .*\.(wma|wmv|asf|mp3|mp4|mmf|zip|rar|jpg|gif|png|swf|flv)$ { # valid_referers none blocked server_names *.test.com http://IP; # if ($invalid_referer) { # return 403; # } # expires 24h; # access_log off; # } location ~ /\. { deny all; } # error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html; # location = /50x.html { # root /usr/share; # } }
docs.title: 配置

docs.text: 平时使用nginx主要是为了实现端口复用,实验室开端口不容易,上次受到攻击后端口只剩一个了,故放弃控制,用nginx实现一个端口访问所有资源(按需配置server便可).两个端口则可以实现 全内网控制 .
docs.title: 使用心得

docs.text: SSH ¶ SSH升级 ¶ # ssh升级 yum update openssh - y && # 升级到yum能达到的最新版本 # yum install xinetd telnet-server -y # 安装telnet-server以及xinetd # 配置telnet # /etc/securetty文件末尾增加一些pts终端 # xvc0 # pts/0 # pts/1 # pts/2 # pts/3 # 启动telnet服务，并设置开机自动启动 # systemctl enable xinetd # systemctl enable telnet.socket # systemctl start telnet.socket # systemctl start xinetd # netstat -lntp|grep 23 # firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-port=23/tcp --permanent mkdir / data / tools - p && cd / data / tools && wget https :// openbsd.hk / pub / OpenBSD / OpenSSH / portable / openssh -8.0 p1.tar.gz && wget https :// ftp.openssl.org / source / openssl -1.0.2 s.tar.gz && tar zxf openssl -1.0.2 s.tar.gz && mv / usr / bin / openssl / usr / bin / openssl_bak && mv / usr / include / openssl / usr / include / openssl_bak && cd / data / tools / openssl -1.0.2 s / && ./config shared && make && make install && ln - s / usr / local / ssl / bin / openssl / usr / bin / openssl && ln - s / usr / local / ssl / include / openssl / usr / include / openssl && echo "/usr/local/ssl/lib" >> / etc / ld.so.conf && / sbin / ldconfig && cd / data / tools / && tar xfz openssh -8.0 p1.tar.gz && cd openssh -8.0 p1 && chown - R root.root / data / tools / openssh -8.0 p1 && rm - rf / etc / ssh /* && ./configure -- prefix =/ usr / -- sysconfdir =/ etc / ssh -- with - openssl - includes =/ usr / local / ssl / include -- with - ssl - dir =/ usr / local / ssl -- with - zlib -- with - md5 - passwords -- with - pam && make && make install && # grep "^PermitRootLogin" /etc/ssh/sshd_config yes # grep "UseDNS" /etc/ssh/sshd_config no cp - a contrib / redhat / sshd.init / etc / init.d / sshd && cp - a contrib / redhat / sshd.pam / etc / pam.d / sshd.pam && chmod + x / etc / init.d / sshd && chkconfig -- add sshd && systemctl enable sshd && mv / usr / lib / systemd / system / sshd.service / data / && chkconfig sshd on # systemctl disable xinetd.service # systemctl stop xinetd.service # systemctl disable telnet.socket # systemctl stop telnet.socket # netstat -lntp 注意: 改好后需做以下修改,保证外网访问. # /etc/ssh/sshd_config PermitRootLogin yes PubkeyAuthentication yes 、 PasswordAuthentication yes 。 # /etc/selinux/config SELINUX = disabled 防爆破 ¶ SSHD不防爆破,需安装DenyHosts等服务,增加爆破成本. 曾经靠DenyHosts让同学用刚学的卡里系统攻击赢了两瓶哇哈哈,而且似乎抵御了一次外网攻击吧.不明白明明只有我一台机子配了这denyhosts,整个实验室的机子的攻击次数都相同.按理说其它机子应该是每天几十万次才对.也许攻击者认为所有机子的配置都一样吧. DenyHosts功能一般,没记错的话fail2ban和fail2jail不仅防SSH爆破,还防DDOS攻击.具体可参照 DDOS生存指南 ,后面有时间会进一步拓展. todo
docs.title: SSH

docs.text: # ssh升级 yum update openssh - y && # 升级到yum能达到的最新版本 # yum install xinetd telnet-server -y # 安装telnet-server以及xinetd # 配置telnet # /etc/securetty文件末尾增加一些pts终端 # xvc0 # pts/0 # pts/1 # pts/2 # pts/3 # 启动telnet服务，并设置开机自动启动 # systemctl enable xinetd # systemctl enable telnet.socket # systemctl start telnet.socket # systemctl start xinetd # netstat -lntp|grep 23 # firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-port=23/tcp --permanent mkdir / data / tools - p && cd / data / tools && wget https :// openbsd.hk / pub / OpenBSD / OpenSSH / portable / openssh -8.0 p1.tar.gz && wget https :// ftp.openssl.org / source / openssl -1.0.2 s.tar.gz && tar zxf openssl -1.0.2 s.tar.gz && mv / usr / bin / openssl / usr / bin / openssl_bak && mv / usr / include / openssl / usr / include / openssl_bak && cd / data / tools / openssl -1.0.2 s / && ./config shared && make && make install && ln - s / usr / local / ssl / bin / openssl / usr / bin / openssl && ln - s / usr / local / ssl / include / openssl / usr / include / openssl && echo "/usr/local/ssl/lib" >> / etc / ld.so.conf && / sbin / ldconfig && cd / data / tools / && tar xfz openssh -8.0 p1.tar.gz && cd openssh -8.0 p1 && chown - R root.root / data / tools / openssh -8.0 p1 && rm - rf / etc / ssh /* && ./configure -- prefix =/ usr / -- sysconfdir =/ etc / ssh -- with - openssl - includes =/ usr / local / ssl / include -- with - ssl - dir =/ usr / local / ssl -- with - zlib -- with - md5 - passwords -- with - pam && make && make install && # grep "^PermitRootLogin" /etc/ssh/sshd_config yes # grep "UseDNS" /etc/ssh/sshd_config no cp - a contrib / redhat / sshd.init / etc / init.d / sshd && cp - a contrib / redhat / sshd.pam / etc / pam.d / sshd.pam && chmod + x / etc / init.d / sshd && chkconfig -- add sshd && systemctl enable sshd && mv / usr / lib / systemd / system / sshd.service / data / && chkconfig sshd on # systemctl disable xinetd.service # systemctl stop xinetd.service # systemctl disable telnet.socket # systemctl stop telnet.socket # netstat -lntp 注意: 改好后需做以下修改,保证外网访问. # /etc/ssh/sshd_config PermitRootLogin yes PubkeyAuthentication yes 、 PasswordAuthentication yes 。 # /etc/selinux/config SELINUX = disabled
docs.title: SSH升级

docs.text: SSHD不防爆破,需安装DenyHosts等服务,增加爆破成本. 曾经靠DenyHosts让同学用刚学的卡里系统攻击赢了两瓶哇哈哈,而且似乎抵御了一次外网攻击吧.不明白明明只有我一台机子配了这denyhosts,整个实验室的机子的攻击次数都相同.按理说其它机子应该是每天几十万次才对.也许攻击者认为所有机子的配置都一样吧. DenyHosts功能一般,没记错的话fail2ban和fail2jail不仅防SSH爆破,还防DDOS攻击.具体可参照 DDOS生存指南 ,后面有时间会进一步拓展. todo
docs.title: 防爆破
